caption.p: a) Percentage of phagocytosis of murine macrophages isolated from the peritoneal cavity of Trem1 −/− or Trem1 +/+ mice and challenged with A. fumigatus for 1 hour. b) Fold change in gene expression levels of TLR2, TLR4, MyD88, CXCL1, IL1β, IL6 and TNFα in murine macrophages isolated from the peritoneal cavity of Trem1 −/− or Trem1 +/+ mice and challenged with A. fumigatus for 2 and 6 hours. Values are represented as bar plots with mean ± SEM. p-values were calculated using the Mann–Whitney U test. **, p < 0.01; *, p < 0.05
